statements: SELECT * FROM advocacy_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM advocacy_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, milestone_1, deadline_1 FROM advocacy_initiatives WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_initiatives FROM advocacy_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name, action_item_1, action_item_2 FROM advocacy_initiatives ORDER BY initiative_id DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date, deadline_1 FROM advocacy_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, milestone_1, action_item_1 FROM advocacy_initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT initiative_name, milestone_1, deadline_1, action_item_1 FROM advocacy_initiatives WHERE milestone_1 = 'Completed';
SELECT initiative_name, milestone_2, deadline_2, action_item_2 FROM advocacy_initiatives WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT initiative_name, milestone_1, milestone_2, action_item_1, action_item_2 FROM advocacy_initiatives WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM advocacy_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date FROM advocacy_initiatives ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, deadline FROM advocacy_initiatives WHERE deadline > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM milestones WHERE completed = true;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestones ORDER BY milestone_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_initiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND deadline < '2022-12-31';
SELECT initiative_name, COUNT(*) AS total_milestones FROM advocacy_initiatives LEFT JOIN milestones ON advocacy_initiatives.id = milestones.id GROUP BY initiative_name;
SELECT initiative_name, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM advocacy_initiatives JOIN milestones ON advocacy_initiatives.id = milestones.id WHERE completed = false ORDER BY milestone_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_initiatives WHERE initiative_name LIKE '%youth%';

SELECT initiative_name, COUNT(*) AS total_milestones FROM advocacy_initiatives LEFT JOIN milestones ON advocacy_initiatives.id = milestones.id WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY initiative_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date FROM advocacy_initiatives;
SELECT id, milestone_description, completion_date FROM milestones;
SELECT item_description, deadline, completed FROM action_items;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM advocacy_initiatives;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_initiatives ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, end_date FROM advocacy_initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT action_items.item_description, milestones.milestone_description FROM action_items JOIN milestones ON action_items.milestone_id = milestones.id;
SELECT initiative_name, COUNT(milestones.id) AS num_milestones FROM advocacy_initiatives LEFT JOIN milestones ON advocacy_initiatives.id = milestones.initiative_id GROUP BY initiative_name;

SELECT initiative_name, item_description, deadline FROM advocacy_initiatives INNER JOIN milestones ON advocacy_initiatives.id = milestones.initiative_id INNER JOIN action_items ON milestones.id = action_items.milestone_id WHERE action_items.completed = false ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date FROM advocacy_initiatives
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM advocacy_initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT milestone_description, milestone_date FROM milestones ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT action_item_description, status FROM action_items WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM advocacy_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM advocacy_initiatives;
SELECT milestone_description, milestone_date FROM milestones ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT deadline_description, deadline_date, initiative_name FROM deadlines JOIN advocacy_initiatives ON deadlines.initiative_id = advocacy_initiatives.initiative_id;

SELECT action_items.action_item_description, action_items.status, deadlines.deadline_date FROM action_items JOIN deadlines ON action_items.deadline_id = deadlines.deadline_id WHERE deadlines.deadline_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM AdvocacyInitiatives;
SELECT id, initiative_name, start_date FROM AdvocacyInitiatives;
SELECT milestone_name, description, target_date FROM Milestones WHERE initiative_id = 1;
SELECT deadline_name, due_date FROM Deadlines ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM Users;
SELECT * FROM AdvocacyInitiatives;
SELECT id, initiative_name, start_date FROM AdvocacyInitiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT Users.username, ActionItems.item_name, Milestones.milestone_name FROM Users JOIN ActionItems ON Users.id = ActionItems.initiative_id JOIN Milestones ON ActionItems.milestone_id = Milestones.id;

SELECT InitiativeName, COUNT(*) AS TotalMilestones FROM AdvocacyInitiatives LEFT JOIN Milestones ON AdvocacyInitiatives.id = Milestones.initiative_id GROUP BY InitiativeName ORDER BY TotalMilestones DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT initiative_name, deadline FROM AdvocacyInitiatives JOIN Deadlines ON AdvocacyInitiatives.id = Deadlines.initiative_id WHERE deadline < '2022-12-31';
